data.title: Memoirs of a Geisha
data.meta_description: -- Nominated as one of America’s best-loved novels by PBS’s  -- Memoirs of a Geisha, we enter a world where appearances are paramount; where a girl's virginity is auctioned to the highest bidder; where women are trained to beguile the most powerful men; and where love is scorned as illusion. It is a unique and triumphant work of fiction—at once romantic, erotic, suspenseful—and completely unforgettable.
